Sasori uses his [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[human puppet]] to create a wall of [[Iron Sand]] in front of him, which he then causes several variable sized spikes to protrude and strikes the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique comes from the appearance of the variable sized spikes resembling a mountain range.

[[pt-br:Cordilheira da Areia de Ferro]]
